topic.title: Using the Windows installer
topic.shortdesc: How to install the FusionInventory agent using Windows installer.

body.p: First of all, you must download the installer package from the following page on the FusionInventory project website: http://prebuilt.fusioninventory.org/stable/windows-i386/
Then, you will just have to launch the installer to start the installation process.
body.note: The installer contains an embedded version of Perl dedicated to the FusionInventory agent, therefore no additional Perl installation is required. This version will not conflict with any other version that may be installed on your system.
If you plan on using Nmap scanning as part of the network discovery, you will have to install the Windows-version of Nmap. The latest version is available at: http://nmap.org/download.html.
